title: CS Competency Enhancement: Project-Based Learning in Social Fields Using Handheld Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners create a community issue data collection plan (e.g., illegal dumping) using handheld devices (smartphones, tablets, etc.), process collected data in Excel/Google Sheets, and represent findings through three or more visualization charts (bar, pie, line graphs)
Enhance collaborative problem-solving skills using digital tools in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment
Improve self-efficacy and intrinsic motivation by at least 20% during the learning process
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
